Package dontlookback

Class Cube

java.lang.Object
dontlookback.Objects
dontlookback.Cube
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entities
public class Cube extends Objects
Cube object for 3D rendering in Don't Look Back Represents a cubic game object with position, size, color, and rotation. Used for building game environments, obstacles, and interactive elements. This implementation uses modern OpenGL rendering through the graphics system.

  • Field Summary
